rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
[i]Slayer [/i]– Whenever an opponent activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, Catria deals 1 damage to that player.
[i]Sisterhood[/i] – If you control a creature named Est and a creature named Palla, Pegasi you control have “[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.”
